description:
Dashboard for Spring Boot2 Statistics(by micrometer-prometheus).
This is a fork of dashboard 6756, fixed for Spring Boot 2.3 and support for Jetty instead of Tomcat along with scraping endpoints' metrics.

panels.tableColumn: hikaricp_connections{app="orders", app_kubernetes_io_instance="mushop", app_kubernetes_io_name="orders", instance="10.1.0.72:80", job="kubernetes-pods", kubernetes_namespace="mushop", kubernetes_pod_name="mushop-orders-67bb8f45c8-5cr5p", mockmode="false", pod_template_hash="67bb8f45c8", pool="HikariPool-1", version="local"}
panels.title: Connections Size

panels.tableColumn: hikaricp_connections_timeout_total{app="orders", app_kubernetes_io_instance="mushop", app_kubernetes_io_name="orders", instance="10.1.0.72:80", job="kubernetes-pods", kubernetes_namespace="mushop", kubernetes_pod_name="mushop-orders-67bb8f45c8-5cr5p", mockmode="false", pod_template_hash="67bb8f45c8", pool="HikariPool-1", version="local"}
panels.title: Connection Timeout Count

targets.expr: irate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{instance="$instance", application="$application", exception="None", uri!~".*actuator.*"}[5m]) / irate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{instance="$instance", application="$application", exception="None", uri!~".*actuator.*"}[5m])

panels.tableColumn: jetty_threads_config_max{app="orders", app_kubernetes_io_instance="mushop", app_kubernetes_io_name="orders", instance="10.1.0.72:80", job="kubernetes-pods", kubernetes_namespace="mushop", kubernetes_pod_name="mushop-orders-67bb8f45c8-5cr5p", mockmode="false", pod_template_hash="67bb8f45c8", version="local"}
panels.title: Max Threads

panels.tableColumn: jetty_threads_config_min{app="orders", app_kubernetes_io_instance="mushop", app_kubernetes_io_name="orders", instance="10.1.0.72:80", job="kubernetes-pods", kubernetes_namespace="mushop", kubernetes_pod_name="mushop-orders-67bb8f45c8-5cr5p", mockmode="false", pod_template_hash="67bb8f45c8", version="local"}
panels.title: Thread Config Min

title: Spring Boot Statistics & Endpoint Metrics
